refnamediv.refpurpose: A physical model of a bowed bar.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: A physical model of a bowed bar, belonging to the Perry Cook family of waveguide instruments.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: ares wgbowedbar kamp, kfreq, kpos, kbowpres, kgain [, iconst] [, itvel] \ [, ibowpos] [, ilow]

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: iconst (optional, default=0) -- an integration constant. Default is zero.
itvel (optional, default=0) -- either 0 or 1. When itvel = 0, the bow velocity follows an ADSR style trajectory. When itvel = 1, the value of the bow velocity decays in an exponentially.
ibowpos (optional, default=0) -- the position on the bow, which affects the bow velocity trajectory.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kpos -- position of the bow on the bar, in the range 0 to 1
kbowpres -- pressure of the bow (as in wgbowed)
kgain -- gain of filter. A value of about 0.809 is suggested.
